tourPackageDetails.documentsRequiredForTravel:
• ADULT: Voters ID / Passport / Aadhar Card / Driving Licence
  • ID card, ID card type, and the ID card number are mandatory at the time of booking, kindly carry the same ID card on tour.
  • For NRI and Foreign National Guests along with Passport, a Valid Indian Visa/ OCI Card/ PIO Card is mandatory.
  • Carry two passport size photos.
tourPackageDetails.exclusions:
• GST Extra
  • Air/Train Fare
  • Entry Tickets Fees
  • Personal Expenses
  • Anything that is not included in Inclusion
tourPackageDetails.thingsToCarryAlong:
• 03 Passport Size Photos
  • 03 photocopies of Adhar card/ Driving License/ Voter ID / Passport
  • Mobile phone with appropriate sim card
  • Along with your necessary clothing and toiletries carry face masks, sun screen lotion, hand sanitizer, sun glasses, cap, sports shoes, umbrella/windcheater, camera, etc. and woolens if needed
    • If on medication, carry sufficient stock of medicines with prescription.

tourPackageDetails.tourRequirement:
• ADULT: Adhar card/ Driving License/ Voter ID / Passport
  • CHILD 5 – 11: Adhar card/ School ID / Passport
  • CHILD 2 – 4: School Id/ Birth Certificate/ Passport
  • INFANT: Birth Certificate/ Passport

tourPackageDetails.weather: • For detailed Information about weather kindly visit www.accuweather.com

travelItinerary.dayInformation: Pick up from Delhi Cantt railway station at 6.30 am & depart for Shimla . Approx 350kms/10-12hrs drive for your onward journey.
After Lunch, Proceed to Kufri, Enjoy Horse Riding at Kufri (Own cost) & Back to the hotel.
After refreshment local sightseeing of Shimla covering Mall road, Mini Train & Visit Hanuman Temple (Own cost)
Depart for Manali at 7AM .Approx 270kms/10hrs drive for your onward journey.
After refreshment local sightseeing of Manali covering Vashisht Hot Springs, Hidimba Devi Temple & Free for Leisure.
Every Morning at 7 AM, Proceed Rohtang Snow Point from Manali.(Own cost)
Checkout at 12PM from Hotel From Manali and Departure for Delhi By Self-Expense.

tourPackageDetails.tourDetailInclusion:
• Accommodation on a sharing basis
  • Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner cooked by our Maharaj (Pure Veg.)
  • All transfers & sightseeing by Non A/C 2×2 bus
  • Services of our tour manager
